name: John Wick - You Can't Survive 2 Rounds!!!
name_original: John Wick - You Can't Survive 2 Rounds!!!
description:
Controls:

A - move to the left

D - move to the right

W - Jump

Story:

There's none, all I can say is try to survive to round 10. If you did it I would call you a genius and a real gamer!!!

There are some bosses. GLHF

Important Tip:

Don't jump a lot.

As a developer, I couldn't win... show me what you can do. It's not impossible. it's just hard

Tell us how far you survived (mention the round)
